dashboard.description:
# Business apps
The Business apps score rates the ability of the employees to open and use business applications (excluding the productivity and collaboration tools) smoothly and with good response times. Business apps can be web or desktop-based.
The score is based on the employees' sentiments as collected with Nexthink Engage and on the following hard metrics retrieved from the endpoints: * Crashes * Freezes * Connectivity * Network response time
:::configuration * In the Finder, edit the categories to insert the [executables](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=DXS%20for%20macOS%20-%20Binary&Type=binary) of the business applications that you wish to monitor (DesktopApp0, DesktopApp1, etc.). Do not rename the keywords, edit exclusively the auto-tagging conditions. * In the Portal, edit the *Business apps* dashboard to rename the labels (Desktop App 0, Desktop App 1, etc.) with the actual names of the applications you chose. ::: tip The widget *Number of devices with issues* lists the devices which have a score below 7 for each category being measured. Hover the mouse over the area of interest and click *Show details* to drill down for the score details. :::
dashboard.name: Business apps

metric.label: Digital Experience Score - Business apps score
DXS for macOS - Business apps - Desktop App 0
DXS for macOS - Business apps - Desktop App 0
DXS for macOS - Business apps - Desktop App 1

dashboard.description:
# Device score
The Device score rates the ability of the employee to start and use a Windows device smoothly and with good response times.
It is based on the employees' sentiments as collected with Nexthink Engage and on the following hard metrics retrieved from the endpoints: * Boot speed * Logon duration * Number of blue screens of death (BSODs) * Number of hard resets * Number of freezes * Free space in the system disk * Memory usage
::: tip The widget *Number of devices with issues* lists the devices which have a score below 7 for each category being measured. Hover the mouse over the area of interest and click *Show details* to drill down for the score details. :::
dashboard.name: Device

dashboard.description:
# Employee satisfaction
The Employee Satisfaction Score rates the feelings and perceptions of the employees when interacting with the overall IT environment (workplace, processes, people).
It is based on the answers to this simple question: *"How satisfied are you with your IT experience at your Company?"*
The widget *What employees complain about* is based on the answers to a follow-up question that enables to better scope the pain points.
dashboard.name: Employee Satisfaction

dashboard.description:
# Overview The Digital Experience Score measures the digital employee experience, defined as the ability of an employee to get things done by interacting with the IT environment in a safe and enjoyable manner.
The score is based on: * Sentiment data collected with a Nexthink Engage campaign * Hard data retrieved by the Collector
By combining hard and sentiment data, the Digital Experience Score assesses the following key aspects of the digital employee experience: * Business applications * Device * Productivity and collaboration * Security * Web browsing * Overall employee satisfaction
dashboard.name: Overview

dashboard.description:
# Productivity and collaboration
The Productivity and collaboration score rates the ability of the end user to start and use the Microsoft Office suite applications smoothly and with good response times.
The score is based on the employees' sentiment as collected with Nexthink Engage and on the following hard metrics retrieved from the endpoints: * Crashes * Freezes * Connectivity * Network response time * Web request duration
The following applications are evaluated: Excel, OneDrive, OneNote, Outlook, PowerPoint, SharePoint, Teams and Word.
::: tip The widget *Number of devices with issues* lists the devices which have a score below 7 for each category being measured. Hover the mouse over the area of interest and click *Show details* to drill down for the score details. :::
dashboard.name: Productivity and collaboration

metric.label: Digital Experience Score - Productivity & Collab. score

dashboard.description:
# Security score
The Security score rates the extent to which the OS, Antivirus and Firewall protect the experience of the end user, considering also the user behavior.
It is based on the employees' sentiments as collected with Nexthink Engage and on the following hard metrics retrieved from the endpoints: * Antivirus real time protection (RTP) status * Antivirus signatures status * Firewall real time protection (RTP) status * Access of dangerous domains * Execution of suspicious binaries
::: tip The widget *Number of devices with issues* lists the devices which have a score below 7 for each category being measured. Hover the mouse over the area of interest and click *Show details* to drill down for the score details. :::
dashboard.name: Security

dashboard.description:
# Web browsing score
The Web browsing score rates the ability of the employee to open a browser and navigate the internet and the intranet smoothly and with good response times.
It is based on the employees' sentiments as collected with Nexthink Engage and on the following hard metrics retrieved from the endpoints: * Browser crashes * Browser freezes * Web request durations for internal destinations * Web request durations for external destinations * Network response time for internal destinations * Network response time for external destinations
:::configuration * Make sure that your internal networks and domains are properly specified in the Web Console as explained [here](https://doc.nexthink.com/Documentation/Nexthink/V6.18/InstallationAndConfiguration/Specifyingyourinternalnetworksanddomains).
::: tip The widget *Number of devices with issues* lists the devices which have a score below 7 for each category being measured. Hover the mouse over the area of interest and click *Show details* to drill down for the score details. :::
dashboard.name: Web browsing

metric.label: Digital Experience Score - Web browsing score
